RTCIceTransportGetRemoteParameters.summary: The getRemoteParameters() method of the interface returns an object that provides information uniquely identifying the remote peer for the duration of the ICE session.

remarks.para: The remote peer's parameters are received during ICE signaling and delivered to the transport when the client calls .

RTCIceTransportGetRemoteParameters.returns: An object indicating the and which uniquely identify the remote peer for the duration of the ICE session.Returns null if the parameters haven't been received yet.
